name: Edgar the Explorer, platform game
description:
Free/libre platformer. Edgar, an old mustached activist (you), has to inspect an underground laboratory. He fights against experimentation on alien beings at Greenalien.

App Store link: https://itunes.apple.com/ch/app/edgar-explorer-jeu-plateforme/id1100015560?l=en (free, no ads)

  • Free movement: left, right, high jump, long jump
  • Use minecarts and elevators
  • Rush or explore slowly: it's up to you!

Images under CC-BY licence, source under LGPL (our repository).

Feel free to reuse or contribute!

How we built it: https://www.facebook.com/edgartheexplorer/
